metadata.title: DPM Dar forms committee to investigate allegations regarding workforce export

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Mar 18 (APP): In response to allegations of alleged irregularities in sending workforce abroad, Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Mohammad Ishaq Dar on Tuesday issued orders to formulate a committee to investigate the matter and uncover the facts. The committee will examine the allegations and present its recommendation to Deputy PM Ishaq Dar, the Foreign Office Spokesperson said in a press statement.
